title: No, video doesn't show Trump being booed at Super Bowl | Fact check
shortDescription: The boos were edited into a 2020 video of the president walking onto the field at the College Football National Championship.

title: This Trump post about Chiefs, 'DEI nonsense' is not real | Fact check
shortDescription: The image is a fabrication. There is no record of the post on Trump's Truth Social account.

title: Trump declines to endorse Vance for 2028 but says VP is 'very capable'
shortDescription: President Trump thinks 'a lot of capable people' could be the Republican standard bearer in 2028 as early speculation begins on a successor.

title: Trump plans to pardon former Democrat Gov. Rod Blagojevich
shortDescription: Blagojevich went to prison on charges related to trying to soliciting funds in exchange for former President Barack Obama's Illinois Senate seat.

title: Donald Trump fires top US government ethics official
shortDescription: The Office of Government Ethics said Monday that President Donald Trump had removed its director, David Huitema.

title: Judge rules Trump White House failed to comply with court order
shortDescription: A U.S. judge on Monday ordered the Trump administration to fully comply with a previous order lifting its broad freeze on federal spending.

title: World reacts to Trump’s threat of steel tariffs
shortDescription: President Trump said he would introduce a new tariff on steel and aluminum imports, as well as reciprocal tariffs. Here's how world leaders responded.

title: Judge extends block on Trump federal worker buyout
shortDescription: The Trump administration offered to pay federal workers through September if they leave now, but unions opposed the offer and a judge blocked it.

title: States sue Trump admin over research funding cut
shortDescription: States and a key Republican senator opposed a Department of Health and Human Services move capping research overhead at 15% of federal grants.

title: Trump's birthright citizenship order blocked
shortDescription: The District Court in New Hampshire granted an injunction which prevents the executive order from being enacted.

title: Trump says Palestinians won't return to a U.S.-ruled Gaza
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he would persuade Jordan and Egypt to settle Palestinians displaced from Gaza under his plan.

title: Trump signs ‘Gulf of America Day’ proclamation
shortDescription: "Even bigger than the Super Bowl." President Trump signed a "Gulf of America Day" proclamation as he flew over the gulf.

title: Kristi Noem: Trump should 'get rid' of FEMA
shortDescription: Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem's remarks come as the administration seeks to pare down the size of the federal government.

title: Third judge blocks Trump’s birthright citizenship order
shortDescription: Three federal courts have blocked President Trump's order denying citizenship to children born to parents without authorization to be in the U.S.

title: 'Gulf of America Day': Trump makes proclamation on Super Bowl flight
shortDescription: As he was flying over the Gulf of Mexico, Donald Trump said he was proclaiming Feb. 9, as 'Gulf of America Day' as he 'restores American pride.'

title: Judges are pausing Trump policy changes. But for how long?
shortDescription: Plus: President Donald Trump says Elon Musk's next DOGE targets are the Pentagon and Education Department. This and more stories on The Excerpt.

title: Trump expected to slap 25% tariffs on steel and aluminum imports
shortDescription: In 2024, 23% of all steel used in the U.S. was imported, with Canada, Brazil, Mexico, South Korea and Vietnam as the biggest suppliers.

title: Trump blasts court decisions stalling executive orders
shortDescription: Trump administration officials have criticized federal court rulings over policies that could lead to showdown over executive power.

title: Trump signs order on school choice and funding
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has signed two executive orders on school funding that fulfill promises he made on the campaign trail.

title: Trump losing patience with ceasefire deal over hostages' condition
shortDescription: "They look like Holocaust survivors," Trump said Sunday of three recently-freed Israeli hostages. "They were in horrible condition."

title: Trump at Super Bowl 59: Presidential photos
shortDescription: President Trump attends Super Bowl LIX, the Kansas City Chiefs vs. Philadelphia Eagles in the Superdome in New Orleans.

title: Trump plans to stop producing new pennies
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced he is directing the treasury secretary to stop the production of pennies as a cost-cutting measure.

title: Who is sitting with Trump at Super Bowl? Politicians, family and more
shortDescription: Members of government and member's of Donald Trump's family are sitting with the president as he becomes first president to attend a Super Bowl.

title: Steel tariffs coming; Trump looks at Education, Defense for savings
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he would target Education and Defense for cost-cutting next and would impose tariffs on steel and aluminum Monday.

title: Majority of US adults approve of Trump's presidency, new poll finds
shortDescription: A majority of US adults polled by CBS News/YouGov approved of how President Donald Trump was handling the presidency in his first month.
